StringProperty.Name: ModuleName
StringProperty.Description: Module name, meaning that headerfiles get installed to $(OutDir)\include\[ModuleName]\. Leave blank to install in the toplevel include directory ($(OutDir)\include\).

DynamicEnumProperty.Description.sys:String: Specifies the targets for the build customization to run before.
Specifies the targets for the build customization to run after.

BoolProperty.Name: UseCustomOutputPath
BoolProperty.Description: If true, use the custom path defined instead of the default.

StringProperty.Name: SubDirOutput
StringProperty.Description: Optional sub directory output. Output will be directed to $(IntDir)\[SubDirOutput] . Leave blank to output to $(IntDir)

StringProperty.Name: OutputFileName
StringProperty.Description: Optional output file name. Default is $(InputName) (which is input file without extension)

StringProperty.Name: CustomOutputPath
StringProperty.Description: The path to save the output to

StringProperty.Description: Output file. Use $(OutDir) or similar macro.

StringListProperty.Description: Should be used for temporary or configuration spesific dependencies.

StringProperty.Name: OutputSubdir
StringProperty.Description: Subdirectory of output directory. Files are written to $(IntDir)\[OutputSubdir]. Optional; output ends up in $(IntDir) if not set.

StringProperty.Name: FunctionPrefix
StringProperty.Description: Prefix for marshallers generated

StringProperty.Name: CopyHeaderPath
StringProperty.Description: Location to copy the header file to. Leave blank if not copying.

StringListProperty.Name: InputHeaders
StringListProperty.Description: List of absolute paths for input header files, separated by semicolon.

StringProperty.Name: OutputSubdir
StringProperty.Description: Subdirectory of output directory. Files are written to $(IntDir)\[OutputSubdir]. Optional; output ends up in $(IntDir) if not set.

StringProperty.Name: InputHeaderDir
StringProperty.Description: Directory of input header files. Optional; Default: ProjectDir. Hence, could be relative from project directory.

BoolProperty.Name: UseFileInputPath
BoolProperty.Description: Use $(InputPath) as the file list instead of a set of batched files.

StringProperty.Name: hFHead
StringProperty.Description: Output file header. (--fhead)

StringProperty.Name: hFProd
StringProperty.Description: Ran for every file listed. (--fprod)

StringProperty.Name: hFTail
StringProperty.Description: Output file trailer. (--ftail)

StringProperty.Name: hEProd
StringProperty.Description: Per enum text (produced prior to value itarations). (--eprod)

StringProperty.Name: hVHead
StringProperty.Description: Value header, produced before iterating over enum values. (--vhead)

StringProperty.Name: hVProd
StringProperty.Description: Value text, produced for each enum value. (--vprod)

StringProperty.Name: hVTail
StringProperty.Description: Value tail, produced after iterating over enum values. (--vtail)

StringProperty.Name: hComments
StringProperty.Description: Comment structure. (--comments)

StringProperty.Name: hTemplate
StringProperty.Description: Template file. (--template)

StringProperty.Name: hOutputPath
StringProperty.Description: The file to generate as a result of the script's output.

StringProperty.Name: hCopyPath
StringProperty.Description: The path to copy this file to. Leave blank if you do not want to copy the file anywhere.

StringProperty.Name: sFHead
StringProperty.Description: Output file header. (--fhead)

StringProperty.Name: sFProd
StringProperty.Description: Ran for every file listed. (--fprod)

StringProperty.Name: sFTail
StringProperty.Description: Output file trailer. (--ftail)

StringProperty.Name: sEProd
StringProperty.Description: Per enum text (produced prior to value itarations). (--eprod)

StringProperty.Name: sVHead
StringProperty.Description: Value header, produced before iterating over enum values. (--vhead)

StringProperty.Name: sVProd
StringProperty.Description: Value text, produced for each enum value. (--vprod)

StringProperty.Name: sVTail
StringProperty.Description: Value tail, produced after iterating over enum values. (--vtail)

StringProperty.Name: sComments
StringProperty.Description: Comment structure. (--comments)

StringProperty.Name: sTemplate
StringProperty.Description: Template file. (--template)

StringProperty.Name: sOutputPath
StringProperty.Description: The file to generate as a result of the script's output.

StringProperty.Name: sCopyPath
StringProperty.Description: The path to copy this file to. Leave blank if you do not want to copy the file anywhere.

StringProperty.Name: WorkingDir
StringProperty.Description: The working directory from which to run this script.

EnumProperty.Name: OutputFiles
EnumProperty.Description: Whether to output just a header or just a source file or both.

EnumProperty.Name: hOutputOperation
EnumProperty.Description: What to do when the output is generated.

EnumProperty.Name: sOutputOperation
EnumProperty.Description: What to do when the output is generated.

DynamicEnumProperty.Description.sys:String: Specifies the targets for the build customization to run before.
Specifies the targets for the build customization to run after.

BoolProperty.Name: ForceStrict
BoolProperty.Description: Treat all sized operands as if 'strict' was used. (--force-strict)

BoolProperty.Name: WarningsAsErrors
BoolProperty.Description: All warnings are treated as errors. (-Werror)

BoolProperty.Name: PreprocessOnly
BoolProperty.Description: Stops assembly after the preprocessing stage. (-e, --preproc-only)

StringProperty.Name: WorkingDir
StringProperty.Description: The working directory from which to run this script.

StringProperty.Name: OutputListFile
StringProperty.Description: Name of list-file output. (-l, --lformat)

StringProperty.Name: OutputObjectFile
StringProperty.Description: Name of object-file output. (-o, --objfile)

StringProperty.Name: OutputMapFile
StringProperty.Description: Name of map-file output. (--mapfile)

StringProperty.Name: PreincludeFile
StringProperty.Description: Pre-include file. (-P)

StringProperty.Name: Prefix
StringProperty.Description: Prepend argument to name of all external symbols. (--prefix)

StringProperty.Name: Suffix
StringProperty.Description: Append argument to name of all external symbols. (--suffix, --postfix)

EnumProperty.Name: DebuggingFormat
EnumProperty.Description: Debugging format. Default depends on the object format. (-g)
